places.name: Horsley Hills
places.description: Horsley Hills, also known as Yenugulla Mallamma Konda, is a beautiful hill station located in Andhra Pradesh, India. Situated at an elevation of 1,265 meters above sea level, it offers breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape.

places.name: Talakona Waterfalls
places.description: Talakona Waterfalls is the highest waterfall in Andhra Pradesh, with a height of 270 feet. Located in the Sri Venkateswara National Park, it's surrounded by dense forests and offers a spectacular view of nature's beauty.

places.name: RK Beach
places.description: RK Beach (Ramakrishna Beach) is one of the most popular beaches in Visakhapatnam. It offers a perfect blend of natural beauty and modern amenities, making it a favorite spot for both locals and tourists.

places.name: Chandragiri Fort
places.description: Chandragiri Fort is a historical fort built in the 11th century. It was the last capital of the Vijayanagara Empire and offers a glimpse into the rich history and architecture of the bygone era.

places.name: Belum Caves
places.description: Belum Caves are the second largest caves in the Indian subcontinent. These natural caves are known for their stalactite and stalagmite formations, creating a mesmerizing underground world.
